text.text: Paneer also known as cottage cheese is a common source of protein in Indian cuisine. Made by curdling the milk, Paneer is not a fermented product like other cheese and tastes the best when it is freshly prepared at home. This recipe is a very instant paneer dish which is extremely healthy and i’m sure will be loved by everyone.
A Pinch of Red Chili Flakes
Cut the paneer into square pieces.
Melt the butter in a skillet and add the paneer pieces.
Add chopped garlic to the paneer and let it cook till the paneer turns brown from the bottom.
Sprinkle the mixed herbs, chili flakes and ground pepper on top of the paneer.
Flip the paneer slices and let the other side cook.
In the end, add chopped coriander to enhance the flavor.
Wait till both sides turn brown and crispy.
Lip-smacking crispy herb and garlic loaded paneer is ready to be served!
Don’t store this dish for later cause it will become soggy and chewy.
I hope you liked this recipe. Comment below if you tried it
